content:
Prev: Short telescope Up: Astronomy Domine Next: Scott sets up his scope

Long telescope



...being readied for the star party Saturday night. The ladder is needed to look through the eyepiece when it's pointing upwards.
Taken Saturday, August 18, 2001, 04:19:42pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 1.1Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/60s @ F7.0, ISO 100, 162mm
